challenges.title: Equipment Integration & System Complexity
challenges.explanation: Automated breadmaking systems would require seamless integration of multiple equipment components – mixers, proofers, retarders, shaping tables, and ovens – all managed by a central control system. Coordinating these disparate systems in a manner that handles the complex temporal dynamics of the breadmaking process presents a significant engineering challenge.  Building a truly integrated and self-correcting system, particularly one capable of adapting to variations in ingredient quality, is extraordinarily complex.
